title: My organization turned Biden’s policies into an easily searchable and sharable website! Looking for feedback!
selftext:
We read through Joe Biden's policies and turned it into easily searchable and sharable graphics to help us turn the conversation back to policy and facts. Go to [https://vote.activate-chi.org/](https://vote.activate-chi.org/), select the reason why they’re voting blue, and share it on their socials! 

We hope the policy people share might convinces someone new to go vote! Visit [https://vote.activate-chi.org/](https://vote.activate-chi.org/)

We’d love for you to check it out and if you have any feedback or suggestions, please let us know!
